Tesla Releases First Quarter 2015 Financial Results | Tesla Investor Relations Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Logo Skip to main content Tesla homepage Investor Relations Skip to main content Dashboard Impact SEC Filings Corporate Governance Press Releases Account Press Releases Press Releases Back Tesla Releases First Quarter 2015 Financial Results Globe Newswire May 6, 2015 &nbsp; PALO ALTO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 05/06/15 -- Tesla today released its financial results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2015, by posting the current Shareholder Letter on its website. Please visit the investor relations section of the Tesla website at http://ir.tesla.com to view the letter. As previously announced, Tesla management will host a live question &amp; answer (Q&amp;A) webcast at 2:30 p.m. Pacific Time (5:30 p.m. Eastern Time) to discuss the results and outlook. What: Tesla First Quarter 2015 Financial Results Q&amp;A Webcast When: Wednesday, May 6, 2015 Time: 2:30 p.m. Pacific Time / 5:30 p.m. Eastern Time Shareholder Letter: http://ir.tesla.com Webcast: http://ir.tesla.com (live and replay) The webcast will be archived on the company's website following the call.
